column1: PART 2: Please  answer the  following  self-reflection questions:
1. What  would you consider the most challenging  in learning your language in this month?
Learning  a lot of  new words. Speaking  about higher level topics.
2. What  actions have  you  taken  that were  most helpful in meeting  your goals/challenges this
Writing hanzi and  using a notebook.
3. What  would you like  to focus on next month?
More speaking practice on higher level  topics.
